summary: The module defines a class that implements uniformly controlled (multiplexed) single‑qubit gates, constructing the appropriate block‑diagonal unitary based on a set of control qubits, validating the supplied matrices, providing inversion, and offering a reference decomposition into elementary quantum operations.
business_intent: Enable compact and efficient representation of conditional single‑qubit operations in quantum circuits, supporting synthesis, compilation, and algorithm development by providing a reusable, validated gate primitive that can be decomposed into standard gate sets.
